title: Neural Networks: Zero to Hero
description: A course by Andrej Karpathy on building neural networks from scratch, from micrograd to GPT.

lectures.title: The spelled-out intro to neural networks and backpropagation: building micrograd
lectures.description: Build an autograd engine and a neural network library from scratch.

lectures.title: The spelled-out intro to language modeling: building makemore
lectures.description: Bigram character-level language model, counting and neural network approaches.

lectures.title: Building makemore Part 2: MLP
lectures.description: MLP language model following Bengio et al. 2003.

lectures.title: Building makemore Part 3: Activations & Gradients, BatchNorm
lectures.description: Internals of MLPs, activations, gradients, and BatchNorm.

lectures.title: Building makemore Part 4: Becoming a Backprop Ninja
lectures.description: Manual backpropagation through the entire MLP.

lectures.title: Building makemore Part 5: Building a WaveNet
lectures.description: Hierarchical / dilated models for language modeling.

lectures.title: Let's build GPT: from scratch, in code, spelled out
lectures.description: Build a GPT from scratch following 'Attention Is All You Need'.

lectures.title: Let's build the GPT Tokenizer
lectures.description: Build a BPE tokenizer from scratch.
